comment.body: There are some people who are around... but I think one of the main problems that come up is there seems to be waves of people flocking to the platform, because of censorship on another platform.  It's never the people that you want moving in next door, so it pushes people who are here for their own reasons out...
comment.body_p: There are some people who are around... but I think one of the main problems that come up is there seems to be waves of people flocking to the platform, because of censorship on another platform.  It's never the people that you want moving in next door, so it pushes people who are here for their own reasons out...
